sense.gloss: universal life force, source of animation for all things
free spirit, mindset unencumbered with worldly concerns

r_ele.r: こうぜんのきをやしなう

sense.gloss: to enliven one's spirit, to refresh oneself, to cheer oneself up

sdata.j: ↑浩二↑↓こうじ↓は↑帰宅↑↓きたく↓の↑途中↑↓とちゅう↓ににわか↑雨↑↓あめ↓に↑会↑↓あ↓った。
sdata.e: Koji was caught in a shower on his way home.

sdata.j: ↑浩二↑↓こうじ↓は↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑帰↑↓かえ↓る↑途中↑↓とちゅう↓でにわか↑雨↑↓あめ↓にあった。
sdata.e: Koji was caught in a shower on his way home.

sdata.j: ↑浩↑↓ひろし↓↑材↑↓ざい↓はどうしてよいか↑途方↑↓とほう↓にくれていた。
sdata.e: Hiroki was at a loss what to do.

sdata.j: ↑社長↑↓しゃちょう↓と↑話↑↓はな↓している↑男↑↓おとこ↓は↑浩↑↓ひろし↓だ。
sdata.e: The man talking with our boss is Hiroshi.

words.gloss: universal life force, source of animation for all things
